de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.im.session

Class AbstractDefaultImSession<T extends ImConnectionAdapter>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.im.session.AbstractDefaultImSession<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the related connection type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ImSession, ImSessionContext
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultImcSession, DefaultImvSession

    abstract class AbstractDefaultImSession<T extends ImConnectionAdapter>
extends Object
implements ImSession, ImSessionContext
    Generic base for an IM(C/V) session. Especially important for inheritance.

      • getNextMessageIdentifier

        private long getNextMessageIdentifier()
        Returns a unique message identifier. This is only safe to use until the identifier reaches a value >= 4294967295. After reaching this limit, the identifier is set to zero and starts again, which leads to duplicate identifiers.
        Returns:
        a message identifier
